title: U.S. weighs South Korea troop reduction: reports
text:
U.S. weighs South Korea troop reduction: reports 11:31am BST - 01:19
The Pentagon has been told to consider options for reducing U.S. troop numbers in South Korea, according to a report in the New York Times on Thursday. President Trump told the Pentagon to prepare options for a draw down of U.S. forces just weeks before a planned meeting between the United States and North Korea.
